author: Milen Grigorov
comment: Lovely Cafe in the heart of beautiful Clevedon. Excellent customer service. Strongly recommend.

author: John Vickerstaff
comment: Definitely the best Ham & Cheese toasted Ciabattas in town! üëç

author: Nina Mayler
comment: Absolutely lovely cafe in Clevedon. Delicious food, lovely atmosphere and wonderful health-conscious products. We‚Äôll be back!

author: Clare Neale
comment: Fantastic cafe! Beautiful coffee. Nice venue to sit and do a few hours work with great coffee and very yummy pancakes.

author: Alison Newman
comment: A wonderful experience, lovely friendly staff, very helpful. The cakes are delicious and the coffee is lovely.

author: George Harris
comment: The goats cheese and onion ciabatta was very tasty indeed. Very friendly service and a nice atmosphere.

author: Jane Baker
comment: Lovely owner with delicious, homemade food! Fantastic independent cafe, would recommend.

author: Sheena Clowater
comment: Delicious, fresh sandwiches at a great price and served with a smile!

author: Val Phillips
comment: The food was delicious and well presented. Laura helped steer me in the right direction to include guests with various diets. Everyone commented on the buffet!

author: Chris Horseman
comment: Warmly welcomed. Lovely coffee where you could taste the different notes of hazelnut and chocolate. Made with passion.

author: Vince Brown
comment: We have been using Mustard for office lunches for nearly 2 years. The quality of the food is excellent and delivery is punctual.

author: Andrew Jones
comment: Great gluten-free carrot cake, washed down with a banana milkshake. The coffee smells divine!

author: Bob Chivers
comment: What a lovely place! Great coffee, and the cake... Wow!

author: Valerie Nash
comment: Lovely food and coffee. Owners could not have been friendlier‚Äîthey even offered a top-up of hot milk to my coffee.

author: Gemma Hein
comment: Laura is the best chef and coffee maker. Perfect teas too!

author: Dovilƒó Arlauskaitƒó
comment: Please do yourself a favour and get a piece of the tahini brownie. It was the tastiest thing I‚Äôve eaten in a long time!

author: Heather Sharrock
comment: Lovely local deli with excellent food and great coffee!

author: Jeanette Moore
comment: A gorgeous cafe. Lovely owner, homemade food and perfect coffee. A real treat for lunch.

author: Judith Phipps
comment: What a gem of a place! Impressed with the delicious, healthy food and friendly service. The coffee was amazing!

author: Gary Viner
comment: Quite the most delicious bacon bap we have enjoyed for a long, long time. Will be back soon!

author: Louise W
comment: Definitely one of the nicest bacon & egg rolls I‚Äôve had! Good quality ingredients and crispy bacon!

author: Helen Papworth
comment: The coffee really is good! The salads and savouries looked very tempting. Excellent cake selection as well.

author: Cathy Fuller
comment: A wonderful vegan lemon cake baked for our grandson's birthday. Delicious! Thank you!

author: Mark Stroud
comment: Mustard catered for my birthday. The food was excellent and we received lots of positive comments from our guests.
